casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

August 11, 2010

[Cite as 08/11/2010 Case Announcements, 2010-Ohio-3697.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

In re Sherrills.

On March 31, 2008, this court found Daries Sherills to be a vexatious litigator under S.Ct.Prac.R. 14.5(B). This court further ordered that Sherrills was prohibited from continuing or instituting legal proceedings in this court without first obtaining leave. On August 4, 2010, Sherrills submitted a request for leave to file a motion for reconsideration. Upon consideration thereof,

It is ordered by the court that the request for leave is denied.
